waiver.name: Disable by message
waiver.description: This waiver disables all problems containing 'JUST_A_FOO_PROBLEM' inside their message.

waiver.name: Demote by path
waiver.description: This waiver turns into warnings all problems reported under '/path/to/foo'.

waiver.name: Promote by path OR message
waiver.description: This waiver turns into errors all problems that contain 'JUST_A_FOO_PROBLEM' inside their message OR were reported under '/path/to/foo'.

waiver.name: Disable by path AND message
waiver.description: This waiver disables all problems that contain 'JUST_A_FOO_PROBLEM' inside their message AND were reported under '/path/to/foo'.
